data.professional_summary: Results-driven Credit Analyst with 5+ years of experience in credit assessment, loan underwriting, and portfolio management at leading Egyptian banks. Proven track record of managing EGP 350M+ SME portfolios while maintaining NPL ratio below 2.5%. Expertise in credit scoring, financial statement analysis, and CBE regulatory compliance. Seeking to leverage analytical skills and banking expertise in a Senior Credit Analyst role.

experience.title: Credit Analyst
bullets: Analyzed 180+ credit applications monthly for SME and corporate clients with combined exposure of EGP 350M, achieving 97% accuracy in risk assessment
Reduced NPL ratio from 4.2% to 2.5% through implementation of enhanced early warning monitoring system
Conducted comprehensive financial statement analysis for credit decisions ranging from EGP 5M to EGP 50M
Collaborated with Collections team to restructure 25 delinquent accounts, achieving 82% recovery rate
Prepared credit committee presentations for facilities exceeding EGP 20M, with 94% approval rate
Implemented automated credit scoring validation process, reducing assessment time by 35%

experience.title: Junior Credit Officer
bullets: Processed 100+ retail and SME credit applications monthly with average ticket size of EGP 2M
Conducted site visits and collateral valuations for 200+ properties across Greater Cairo
Supported senior analysts in preparing credit memos and risk assessments for corporate facilities
Maintained portfolio documentation in compliance with CBE regulatory requirements
Achieved 98% accuracy rate in financial data entry and creditworthiness calculations

technical: Excel (Advanced: VLOOKUP, Pivot Tables, DCF Models)

education: Bachelor of Commerce, Accounting Major - Cairo University, 2017
certifications: Egyptian Banking Institute - Credit Analysis Certificate, 2019
